t: The Righteous Will Never Be Moved
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Blessed*ln is the man who fears the Lord,*s who*ld greatly delights in his commandments!
His*ln offspring will be mighty in the land; the*ld generation of the upright will be blessed.
Wealth*ln and riches are in his house, and*ld his righteousness endures forever.
Light*ln dawns in the darkness for the upright; he*ld is gracious, merciful, and righteous.
It*ln is well with the man who deals generously and lends; who*ld conducts his affairs with justice.
For*ln the righteous will never be moved; he*ld will be remembered forever.
He*ln is not afraid of bad news; his*ld heart is firm, trusting in the Lord.*s
His*ln heart is steady; he will not be afraid, until*ld he looks in triumph on his adversaries.
He*ln has distributed freely; he has given to the poor; his*ld righteousness endures forever; his*ld horn is exalted in honor.
The*ln wicked man sees it and is angry; he*ld gnashes his teeth and melts away; the*ld desire of the wicked will perish!
